name: Audi A3
details: The Audi A3 has a dynamic exterior design that reveals each muscular and chiseled detail and the MMI® touch display infotainment system features a 10.1″ screen.

name: Honda Accord Turbo
details: The Honda Accord Turbo has a perfect blend of elegance and fun. It looks robotic and is one of the most unique sedan cars in the Bangladeshi market.

name: Honda CR-V Turbo
details: Honda CR-V Turbo is a direct competitor of Nissan X-trail, Toyota RAV4 and Mazda CX-5. The CR-V is built with a spacious interior to adapt to the comfort and a luxurious .

name: BMW X3
details: The BMW X3 is a small compact luxury crossover SUV. The X3 ranks at the top of the luxury compact SUV class because of its spacious interior, easy-to-use features, strong engine performance, smooth handling.

name: Suzuki Dzire
details: Suzuki Dzire is one of the most fuel-efficient cars in this segment. Because of the manual transmission system, this machine can produce better power figures. It moves smoothly in a heavy rush and you do not get tired of driving.

name: Nissan Patrol
details: The Nissan Patrol is an off-road large family 4×4 SUV. It offers a level of luxury and value. The Nissan Patrol is a series of four-wheel-drive vehicles manufactured by Nissan in Japan and sold throughout the world.

name: KIA SONET
details: The Kia Sonet is a compact SUV with the tough built quality and enough engine power so it can take on any type of road with ease. It offers the power of 120 PS .

name: Hyundai Elantra
details: The Hyundai Elantra is a compact car and it offers a comfortable ride. It offers tons of features for the price, excellent fuel economy,

name: KIA SONET
details: The Kia Sonet is a compact SUV with the tough built quality and enough engine power so it can take on any type of road with ease. It offers the power of 120 PS .

name: Toyota Camry
details: The 2020 Toyota Camry has all the basic qualities that a sedan offers. It provides a more classy stylish comfortable ride

name: Mitsubishi Pajero Sports
details: The Mitsubishi Pajero Sports is a well-made, well-priced family-friendly wagon. There are five-seat and seven-seat versions .

name: Renault Duster
details: Renault Duster is a 1500cc SUV within budget which brand  comes with a 1498cc powerful engine which provides 142 Nm .

name: Mercedes-Benz GLC
details: The Marcedes-Benz GLC is a 5 seater compact luxury crossover SUV with an Automatic (Torque Converter). It gives a ground clearance of 201 mm and boot space of 580 liters.

name: Audi Q8
details: The Audi Q8 is the flagship mid-size luxury crossover SUV of Audi. The exterior of the Q8 has an octagonal-shaped grille, LED headlamps, 22-inch alloy wheels, frame-less doors, silver skid plates and LED taillights.  .
